member.name: MFT_REGISTRATION_INFO.clsid
member.summary: CLSID of the Media Foundation transform (MFT) to register.

member.name: MFT_REGISTRATION_INFO.guidCategory
member.summary: GUID that specifies the category of the MFT. For a list of MFT categories, see MFT_CATEGORY.

member.name: MFT_REGISTRATION_INFO.uiFlags
member.summary: Bitwise OR of zero or more flags from the enumeration.

member.name: MFT_REGISTRATION_INFO.pszName
member.summary: Wide-character string that contains the friendly name of the MFT.

member.name: MFT_REGISTRATION_INFO.cInTypes
member.summary: Number of elements in the pInTypes array.

member.name: MFT_REGISTRATION_INFO.pInTypes
member.summary: Pointer to an array of structures. Each member of the array specifies an input format that the MFT supports. If this member is NULL, the cInTypes member must be zero.

member.name: MFT_REGISTRATION_INFO.cOutTypes
member.summary: Number of elements in the pOutTypes array.

member.name: MFT_REGISTRATION_INFO.pOutTypes
member.summary: Pointer to an array of structures. Each member of the array defines an output format that the MFT supports. If this member is NULL, the cOutTypes member must be zero.
